IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO IDENTIFY THE CAUSE OF, FIND THE CURE FOR AND CONTROL THE EFFECTS OF TOURETTE SYNDROME.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO IDENTIFY THE CAUSE OF, FIND THE CURE FOR, AND CONTROL THE EFFECTS OF TOURETTE SYNDROME. THE TOURETTE ASSOCIATION IS DEDICATED TO MAKING LIFE BETTER FOR ALL PEOPLE AFFECTED BY TOURETTE AND TIC DISORDERS.
IRS990.Desc: PUBLIC EDUCATION - PROVIDE EDUCATION AND AWARENESS BY RAISING PUBLIC AWARENESS AND FOSTERING SOCIAL ACCEPTANCE. EDUCATING PROFESSIONALS TO BETTER SERVE THE NEEDS OF CHILDREN, ADULTS AND FAMILIES CHALLENGED BY TOURETTE AND TIC DISORDERS. ADVOCATING FOR PUBLIC POLICIES AND SERVICES THAT PROMOTE POSITIVE SCHOOL, WORK AND SOCIAL ENVIRONMENTS. PROVIDING HELP, HOPE AND A SUPPORTIVE COMMUNITY ACROSS THE NATION. EMPOWERING OUR COMMUNITY TO DEAL WITH THE COMPLEXITIES OF THIS SPECTRUM OF DISORDERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: RESEARCH & MEDICAL PROGRAMS - WORKING TO ADVANCE SCIENTIFIC UNDERSTANDING, TREATMENT OPTIONS AND CARE OPTIONS FOR THE DISORDER BY PROVIDING FUNDING FOR RESEARCH INVESTIGATIONS IN THE AREAS OF NEUROSCIENCES, GENETICS, BEHAVIORIAL THERAPY, CLINICAL TRIALS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: CENTERS FOR DISEASE CONTROL (CDC) PARTNERSHIP - THE ASSOCIATION AND CDC WORK TOGETHER TO PROVIDE EXPERT EDUCATION ABOUT TOURETTE SYNDROME TO PHYSICIANS AND ALLIED PROFESSIONAL AND TO ENCOURAGE PHYSICIANS TO APPLY TO THE ASSOCIATIONS ' REFERRAL LISTS. INCLUDES PROGRAMS TO EDUCATE SCHOOLS AND COMMUNITIES ABOUT TOURETTE SYNDROME.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: THE TOURETTE SYNDROME BEHAVIOR TRAINING INSTITUTE ( "TS- BTI") WAS CREATED TO EXPAND THE NUMBER OF HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS COMPETENTLY TRAINED IN BEHAVIOR THERAPY FOR TOURETTE SYNDROME AND OTHER TIC DISORDERS.
PROFESSIONAL EDUCATION - PROVIDES FOR THE EDUCATION AND AWARENESS OF TOURETTE SYNDROME TO MEDICAL PROFESSIONALS, THROUGH AMONG OTHER THINGS, SEMINARS AND DISTRIBUTION OF RESEARCH UPDATES.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: FUNDRAISING INCOME - 2018 AMOUNT: $ 123,370. 2019 AMOUNT: $ 101,125. 2021 AMOUNT: $ 61,295. 2022 AMOUNT: $ 91,446. MISCELLANEOUS INCOME - 2020 AMOUNT: $ 3,185. 2021 AMOUNT: $ 20,319. 2022 AMOUNT: $ 106,191.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TAA ADVOCATES TO ENSURE GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS UNDERSTAND TOURETTE SYNDROME (TS) AND TIC DISORDERS (TD) AND TO ENSURE POLICIES AND REGULATIONS BEING DRAFTED, RELEASED AND FINALIZED OR SIGNED INTO LAW ARE IN THE BEST INTERESTS OF THOSE WITH TS OR TD. WE ALSO ADVOCATE TO ENSURE ADEQUATE GOVERNMENT FUNDING IS PROVIDED FOR THE CDC TOURETTE SYNDROME PUBLIC HEALTH EDUCATION AND RESEARCH PROGRAM AND AT THE NATIONAL INSTITUTES OF HEALTH'S NATIONAL INSTITUTE OF NEUROLOGICAL DISORDERS AND STROKE AND THE NATIONAL INSTITUTE OF MENTAL HEALTH.
THE INTENDED USE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO SUPPORT THE WORK OF THE PUBLIC EDUCATION (INFORMATION & REFERRAL SERVICE) PROGRAM.

THE ASSOCIATION BELIEVES IT HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF FEBRUARY 28, 2022 AND FEBRUARY 28, 2021 IN ACCORDANCE WITH ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION ("ASC") TOPIC 740, WHICH PROVIDES STANDARDS FOR ESTABLISHING AND CLASSIFYING ANY TAX PROVISIONS FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.SpecificServicesProvidedTxt: RESEARCH GRANT TO FURTHER TOURETTE'S MISSION
RESEARCH GRANT TO FURTHER TOURETTE'S MISSION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTEE IS REQUIRED TO SUBMIT ANNUAL PROGRESS REPORTS.
THE ASSOCIATION MUST RECEIVE A FINAL PROGRESS REPORT DESCRIBING RESEARCH AND OUTCOMES AS WELL AS HOW FUNDS HAVE BEEN USED. ADVISORY BOARDS REVIEW AND APPROVE BEFORE FINAL PAYMENT IS MADE.
THE NUMBER IN COLUMN B REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF SHARES RECEIVED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM. THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER FOR THEIR REVIEW. THE FORM 990 IS ONLY FILED AFTER EACH BOARD MEMBER FORMALLY APPROVES THE 990.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS SIGNED ANNUALLY BY BOARD MEMBERS AND MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS A PERSONNEL/COMPENSATION COMMITTEE. THE CHAIR ASSIGNS THE MEMBERS TO DO RESEARCH AND COME UP WITH RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE COMMITTEE FOR THE OFFICERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS OF OVERSEEING THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
